name: userZak
description:
Get Userâ€™s Zoom Access Token (ZAK). You can use a ZAK to enable a non-login user to join a meeting on your app. Non-login users do not need to enter their username and password to join meetings. **Scope:** `user_zak:read`
**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `Light`
